alert.note: Alert for Kent; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:47PM EDT until June 25 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kent County in southwestern Michigan... Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Greenville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville... Stanton... Rockford... Howard City... Edmore... Lakeview... Grattan... Cedar Springs... Sidney... Sand Lake... McBride... Pierson... Westville... Gowen... Wells Airport... Cedar Lake... Entrican... Amble... Turk Lake... Wyman... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
